# default

**Type Property**

The system’s default vertical placement.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: DynamicIslandExpandedRegionVerticalPlacement
```

## Configuring vertical content placement

- **belowIfTooWide**: Vertical placement below the default vertical position for content that’s too wide to fit next to the TrueDepth camera.

items.description: Vertical placement below the default vertical position for content that’s too wide to fit next to the TrueDepth camera.
